tool_description: Creates optimized maintenance schedules based on vehicle needs, resource constraints, and business priorities.

fleet_vehicles.description: List of vehicle IDs to include in scheduling

schedule_start_date.description: Start date for the maintenance schedule

schedule_end_date.description: End date for the maintenance schedule

max_simultaneous_maintenance.description: Maximum number of vehicles that can be in maintenance simultaneously

priority_weighting.description: Priority strategy: safety_first, cost_optimal, or availability_focused

maintenance_window_hours.description: Daily maintenance window as [start_hour, end_hour] in 24h format

exclude_weekends.description: Whether to exclude weekends from scheduling

error_messages: Invalid date range: schedule_start_date must be before schedule_end_date and both must be future dates.
Invalid priority weighting: Use one of [safety_first, cost_optimal, availability_focused].
Invalid maintenance window: maintenance_window_hours must contain exactly 2 integers between 0-23 with start < end.
Insufficient capacity: max_simultaneous_maintenance must be at least 1 and realistic for fleet size.
Empty fleet list: fleet_vehicles array cannot be empty.
usage: Provide fleet_vehicles list and date range, optionally customize scheduling constraints. The tool returns an optimized maintenance schedule with time slots and assignments.

schedule_id.description: Unique identifier for the generated schedule

scheduled_maintenances.description: List of scheduled maintenance entries with vehicle and time details

total_scheduled_items.description: Total number of maintenance items scheduled

utilization_rate.description: Percentage of available maintenance capacity utilized
